price: Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti “(Allah) ni We wabaremye, abaha ukumva (amatwi), amaso n’imitima (ibafasha gutekereza); ariko mushimira gake!”
arabic: قُلۡ هُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنشَأَكُمۡ وَجَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمۡعَ وَٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرَ وَٱلۡأَفۡـِٔدَةَۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qul huwa alladhī ansha-akum wajaʿala lakumu al-samʿa wal-abṣāra wal-afidata qalīlan mā tashkurūna
